parameters.name: prompt
prompt
parameters.value:
Create a high-converting landing page for this lead magnet:

Title: {{ $('Select Lead Magnet Type').item.json.title }}
Value: {{ $('Select Lead Magnet Type').item.json.value }}

Write HTML/CSS for a complete landing page including:
1. Compelling headline and subheadline
2. Benefit-focused bullet points
3. Social proof and testimonials
4. Email capture form
5. Urgency/scarcity elements
6. Professional design with TenantFlow branding
7. Mobile-responsive layout
8. Trust signals and guarantees
9. Clear call-to-action buttons
10. Exit-intent popup trigger

Focus on conversion rate optimization and revenue generation. Use proven copywriting techniques and psychological triggers.

{{ $('Generate Lead Magnet Content').item.json.response }}

---

## TenantFlow Integration

This lead magnet integrates with TenantFlow to:
- Capture high-quality leads
- Demonstrate platform value
- Convert free users to paid subscribers
- Build email list for nurturing campaigns

### Conversion Funnel:
1. Lead downloads free resource
2. Email nurturing sequence begins
3. TenantFlow trial offer
4. Premium feature upsells
5. Long-term customer retention

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
Create a 7-day email nurturing sequence for this lead magnet:

Lead Magnet: {{ $('Select Lead Magnet Type').item.json.title }}

Create 7 emails that:
1. Day 1: Welcome & deliver the lead magnet
2. Day 2: Additional tips related to the topic
3. Day 3: Success stories and case studies
4. Day 4: Common mistakes and how TenantFlow prevents them
5. Day 5: Advanced strategies and premium features
6. Day 6: Limited-time trial offer
7. Day 7: Final call-to-action and testimonials

Each email should:
- Have compelling subject lines
- Provide genuine value
- Build trust and authority
- Include soft CTA to TenantFlow
- Progress toward premium subscription
- Use proven email marketing techniques

Format as JSON with subject, content, and CTA for each email.

meta.description: Creates valuable lead magnets with landing pages and email sequences to capture leads and generate revenue through TenantFlow conversions
